title._content: Image taken from page 10 of 'The Military Operations of General Beauregard in the war between the States, 1861 to 1865. Including a brief personal sketch, and a narrative of his services in the war with Mexico, 1846-8'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Military Operations of General Beauregard in the war between the States, 1861 to 1865.
